title: csv file not created when running analyze_video with save_as_csv set to True

labels.name: howtousedlc
labels.description: issue regarding the use of DeepLabCut

body:
**Describe the bug**


Wanted to create csv files to use the data in R but the analysis does not output any csv file, even though `save_as_csv` is set to `True`

Using maDLC Analyze video in the GUI works fine and is able to create video.

Tried in terminal with ipython as well as jupyter notebook, with not luck. There is also no error indicating the failure to produce a csv file.

The file to be analyzed is on a mounted samba share. Just stating it here since DLC had some troubles with such shares (symlinks etc.)

```
import deeplabcut
videos = ['Y:/Muad/thermicnator/cohort1/10_29_2019/20191029-H17M25S35.avi']
deeplabcut.analyze_videos(config = "D:/muad/config.yaml",
                          videos= videos,
                        save_as_csv= True,
                         batchsize = 16,
                         dynamic = True)
```

```
Using snapshot-25000 for model D:/muad\dlc-models\iteration-2\thermicnatorDec19-trainset95shuffle1
Initializing ResNet
Activating extracting of PAFs

  0%|                                                                                        | 0/28510 [00:00<?, ?it/s]

Starting to analyze %  Y:/Muad/thermicnator/cohort1/10_29_2019/20191029-H17M25S35.avi
Y:\Muad\thermicnator\cohort1\10_29_2019  already exists!
Loading  Y:/Muad/thermicnator/cohort1/10_29_2019/20191029-H17M25S35.avi
Duration of video [s]:  1425.5 , recorded with  20.0 fps!
Overall # of frames:  28510  found with (before cropping) frame dimensions:  640 480
Starting to extract posture

28785it [18:00, 26.63it/s]                                                                                             

Saving results in Y:\Muad\thermicnator\cohort1\10_29_2019...

```

Only two files produced by the analysis:
```
20191029-H17M25S35DLC_resnet50_thermicnatorDec19shuffle1_25000_full.pickle
20191029-H17M25S35DLC_resnet50_thermicnatorDec19shuffle1_25000_meta.pickle

```
**Desktop (please complete the following information about your system):**
 - OS: Windows Server 2019
 - DeepLabCut Version: 2.2b8
 - DeepLabCut mode: multi-animal tracking (but single animal)
 - Browser: firefox
